summary: Mage follower specializing in frost spells. Face design by darrenstone, mod packaged by maxiteo.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/vbhxCpc.png[/img]
[center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=4]Character design by: darrenstone
Mod packaged by: maxiteo
[/size][/font]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HN8DccZ.png[/img][/center]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/091OXke.png[/img]
[font=Georgia][size=4][i][color=#c9daf8] Karin is an adventuring, self-declared "Ice Mage" (as she was only interested in Ice spells, saying that they were... really cool) who came to the College of Winterhold to further her studies in Destruction (mainly Frost) magic.

As she avoided sharing any details regarding her background, including who her previous teachers were and where she originated from, she was highly unwelcome by the majority of mages and students at the College. Savos Aren, however, seemed to know something about her, and despite objections from others in authority, agreed to allow her access to classes and the resources in the Arcanaeum.

Rumors had first begun to spread that she was possibly a spy sent by one of the mage guilds, possibly the College of Whispers or The Synod, but given her clumsy nature of knocking over books everywhere in the Arcanaeum and her insistence on only studying Frost spells (which most of Skyrim's creatures and bandits were resistant to), these rumors slowly subsided over time.

What the College residents didn't know, was that they were half right. She was sent, albeit indirectly, by a mage order far more powerful than both the Synod and the College of Whispers. Karin herself was unaware that she was being used by this order as a sleeper agent; and with the emergence of the Dragonborn, plans were about to be set in motion...
[/color][/i][/size][/font]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/CkVJpcL.png[/img]
[center]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/oKvD4tj.jpg[/img]
[color=#cfe2f3][size=4]6 Sept 2017: Karin made Hot Files! Thanks for the support![/size][/color][/center]

maxiteo:[list]
[*][size=3]darrenstone PMed me to ask if I was interested in making his preset into a follower, and I was happy to do it =)[/size]
[*][size=3]For all permissions and requests, I would prefer you to contact darrenstone directly, as Karin is his creation *fires arrow*[/size]
[*][size=3]As the body textures are a customized blend of Adorable Face and PureSkinTexture (with permission from both authors) and created for UNP, a CBBE version is not possible at this point in time. Track this file for updates![/size]
[*][size=3]IF KARIN KEEPS DISAPPEARING, IT'S A COMMON HDT BUG. REMOVE HER CLOAK IF IT BOTHERS YOU.[/size]
[*][size=3]I haven't decided if I am going to give Karin a big role in my quest mod, which is underway at the moment. If I can manage it without breaking things (or myself), I will try to integrate her into the main questline of my mod, instead of just a short guest appearance.[/size]
[/list]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/1jDQGZV.png[/img]
[center][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/37342510/?]darrenstone[/url] for the lovely preset
(and all the related files packaged very neatly)[/size][/center]

[center][size=3]Special thanks to NewerMind43 for allowing me to use his mod for Karin's default armor:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56962/?]Dagger Lady by [b]NewerMind43[/b] [/url]

Mods used for character creation:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?]Fair Skin Complexion by [b]HHaleyy[/b] [/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73853/?]PureSkinTexture by [b]Anini n Regenbot03[/b] [/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7625/?]numenume femalebrows MARO by [b]numenume[/b] [/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3589/?]Natural Eyes by [b]nevenbridge[/b] [/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos - Renewal by [b]Kalilies Stealthic Khaos and Shocky[/b] [/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900/?]UNP BLESSED BODY- UNPB REDUX PROJECT by [b]Blessed Redux Project team[/b] 
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?]Enhanced Character Edit by [b]ECE team[/b] [/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40494/?]NPC Nif Merge by [b]Turulo[/b] [/url][/size][/center]
